name: SuperDie
description:
First time actually finishing a game.

I wouldn't say it's good but I'm just glad I was able to finish something.

WASD - Movement

Space - Jump

R - Reset Level

Mouse - Look

External Assets Used:

Grass Texture - https://opengameart.org/content/seamless-grass-texture-ii

Carter One - https://www.1001fonts.com/carter-one-font.html

Bangers - https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Bangers

Camera Controller (modified) - 

https://gist.github.com/3dln/c16d000b174f7ccf6df9a1cb0cef7f80
